name: TMI Post/Followers/Drafts/Queue Replacement
description:
Inspired by The Mortal Instruments, this code replaces the following:

"Posts" becomes "Runes"
"Followers" becomes "Nephilim"
"Drafts" becomes "Forsaken"
"Queue" becomes "Idris"

user.name: kickitintheslash
user.about: I run a Supernatural blog on tumblr at kickitintheslash and a THG/TMI/HP blog at oneoftheclave.
